reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable & No Issues
reviews.reviewText: Have found this to be reliable. Use for school and the memory sufficient. Happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and Powerful Laptop
reviews.reviewText: The Laptop arrived well packaged, safe and sound and on time. It is light weight, fast, and love the touch of the keyboard...like that the keyboard has back lighting. Touch screen responds quickly to a light touch. I have only been using it for a week now, but it sure is everything I need in a laptop for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another good couple of buys!!
reviews.reviewText: A well-made unit packs a pretty good punch for a laptop, it doesn't have a CD/DVD so I purchased the:NEVVIS【8 in 1】 External CD/DVD Drive for Laptop USB 3.0 Type-C Portable CD/DVD +/-RW Burner Writer Player with SD/TF Card Slots Compatible for Desktop PC Mac OS MacBook Windows Linux, along with it and that was another good buy, it didn't have to install drivers for use so it goes along really well!! It's still early as far as use, but so far, excellent!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It a good laptop for the average person.
reviews.reviewText: The laptop is good for the price you pay. It has many excellent qualities. The speed is great. The like the keyboard and its lighting is excellent. It also is light enough to carry around and use on your lap. What I'm not crazy about is the screen. The colors aren't vibrant and that's because it uses the on board display adapter. It's adequate but nothing to write home about. Also, if you have a lot of peripherals, like I do, you'll need a USB Hub. It has the standard ports but only 2 standard USB ports and one type C USB port. So if you use a mouse and wired printer your done. I have a few external hard drives, a few flash drives and few things that need charging. I hate plugging & unplugging cables so I bought a 10 port powered USB hub to handle everything I need. It does have am HDMI port and a card reader. The card reader works, but it isn't the best. I'm use to card readers that are spring loaded. You push the card in until it clicks and to remove it, you push it in again and it pops out. Not so with this one. You push the card in until it stops to use it. To remove the card you have to try to grab the card and pull it out without the spring assist. It works, but it's cheap. I use to buy higher end laptops every few years. But since I use my phone more and more, I don't have the need. This is a very usable laptop if you don't need breakneck speed and you don't need high end graphics. I'm happy with this laptop because it fills my current needs, but I don't use it for high end gaming, watching movies or editing photographs. If I did, I'd buy a higher end laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we need!
reviews.reviewText: First thing, the laptop came way faster than advertised. The set up was easy and my wife now has a laptop that can smoothly run Photoshop for her job. The ability to turn on and off the backlight is a nice feature. There aren't any issues with the screen, given the work she does that is very important. I'm glad she in a position to do everything and still have the option to have a portable entertainment machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is a great laptop. I use it for both school and work. I love the touch screen and the backlit keyboard. The battery life is decent, although I do wish it lasted a little bit longer without having to be plugged in.
